chat_history.message:
Hello,
My product iPhone 12 mini has the above problem:
Dear ladies and gentlemen,
According to the timeline in the ordering process, my order should have arrived at my place today. Unfortunately, it seems that the order has not been shipped yet.
Could you please check the status of the shipment and let me know when it will arrive?
Thank you very much in advance.
Best regards
Dominik Bergmann
Thank you for your help,

Hello, 

We wanted to let you know Dominik hasn’t received their order.

We’ve checked the tracking link, but there isn’t any.

Can you let us know if the order was shipped, and under which tracking number?
In case the order was not shipped yet, please ship it and provide a valid tracking number, or refund the order under 1 business day.

If you've shipped the order but it's lost, we will gather the paperwork from the customer and forward it to you. We'll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment.

If the delivery starts moving again, a refund won’t be issued, and the order will be considered late.

Let us know if you have any questions or concerns — we’ll keep an eye out for your reply.

Thanks for your help,
Feyza, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Our logistics partner had flagged out this order for a potential wrong address. We are currently preparing to ship the parcel and want to ensure a seamless delivery experience for our valued customer. To help us achieve this, could you kindly verify the customer's address? 

Werdensteinstr. 14
89155 Dellmensingen
Germany

This simple confirmation can significantly contribute to avoiding any potential delivery delays or instances of parcels going astray. Your cooperation in this matter is greatly appreciated.

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile,

Please send to:

Werdensteinstraße 14
89155 Erbach-Dellmensingen
Germany

Please send the package within 48 hours or we will refund the order. Thank you!

Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We extend our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience caused. It has come to our attention that the parcel may have been stolen. We take such incidents very seriously and have launched an extensive internal inquiry to ascertain the circumstances surrounding this unfortunate event. As a gesture of our commitment to customer satisfaction and to alleviate any inconvenience caused, we have promptly refunded the customer in full for their order.

Regards,
RK
